description: Design expert sharing knowledge items obtained after attending an industry workshop.  Pre-retirement product manager contributes information that proves valuable to employees after her retirement. Corporate communications manager preparing for a press release finds all the information she needs prior to a meeting, gets ready and saves time going over basics during the meeting. Sales rep coming back from vacation quickly gets up to speed on all important topics and gets back to being productive.
